name: Cookies & Cataracts
description:
A platformer-turned-memory-puzzle game - make your way through the house to get yourself a cookie while your vision falls apart

Navigate the stage to collect yourself a sweet cookie. Once you have your treat, head back to your seat! In your old age, your vision is starting to fall apart, navigate your house through memory as your sight starts to leave you.

Controls:

In Game:  to move,  to wake up/go to sleep,  to restart a level
Menu:  to navigate,  to select,  to go back

Made in 48 hours and WINNER of the 37th GM48 Game Jam

Check out the original v1.0 here: https://gm48.net/game/1804/cookies-cataracts
